client-settings.name: 株式会社ブロンコビリー

extension-param.param-value: style:#site-translate-header-wrapper{width:100% !important; height:44px; position: fixed; top:0; z-index: 9999;}#site-translate-header-wrapper p{font-size:10px;line-height: 12px;}#site-translate-message{display:table-cell; height:44px; vertical-align:middle; width:5000px;} body {margin: 44px auto 0;} .header {top: 44px;} #header {top: 44px !important;} .header .search span{font-size: 1.2rem;} /* Top */ .main .menu_content_item {max-width: 632px;} .main .news_content_item_title {text-align: left;max-width: 700px;} /* Menu */ .steak_list .steak_anchor_set_title {width: auto; padding: 5px 10px;} .steak_list .steak_anchor_set_list{width: auto;} .steak_list .steak_anchor_set_sub{width: auto; padding: 5px 10px;} .article .related_info_price .price_list_item {width: auto; padding: 27px;} /* shop */ .prefecture_name {line-height: 1.2;} .prefecture_wrapper.osaka .prefecture_name {-webkit-writing-mode: inherit; -ms-writing-mode: inherit; writing-mode: inherit; letter-spacing: normal;} .prefecture_wrapper.nagoya .prefecture_name {width: auto;} .prefecture_wrapper.aichi .prefecture_name {width: auto;} /* feature */ .feature_top .button_small{width: auto; padding: 10px 35px 8px 20px;} /* recruit */ #mission header div li.nav02 a, #mission header div li.nav03 a {font-size: 1.4rem;} #management h1, #management h1 + p {text-align: left;} #staff > header {background-position: center 20px;} #staff > header h1 {background-position: center 50px;} /* recruit/career_info/ */ #flow .last_txt {padding-left: 0; letter-spacing: normal; } @media screen and (max-width: 767px) { .header .search{width: auto;} .article .contents_title{margin: 30px auto 0;} .steak_list .steak_anchor_set_sub{width: 49%; } }
